ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the basics of agriculture on this new world. Allows the growing of new crops, which are native to this planet. Unlocks the ability to cultivate corn, rice, and strawberries. Unlocks the secret of hydroponic gardening. Also unlocks fences, to keep those pesky critters away from your crops!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further advancements in agriculture, give your colonists the ability to fertilize the soil. Unlocks the composter, which allows you to create mulch from wood logs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increased familiarity with the planets environment unlocks the secret of hydroponic gardening. This allows your colonists to build the hydroponic table, to allow for indoor gardening.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture IV
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced knowledge of this planets environment gives your colonists the ability to terraform. This unlocks the terraforming pump, which allows you to create farmable soil anywhere.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Agriculture V
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlocks the secret of Advanced hydroponic gardening.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Extra food Research I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Minor Discovery: This allows colonists to build the food synthesizer. While not the most tasty of ways to get a meal, the past is nutritious, and it does free up colonists to do other things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Extra food Research II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Minor Discovery: This increases the efficiency of the food synthesizer. It now consumes 50% less organic feedstock per meal produced.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Extra food Research III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the Soylent Green Machine to make Soylent Green from "Plankton".

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows your colonists to build a coffee machine, brewery and still, so they can transform hops, berries, rice. agave, and corn, into tasty, tasty beer, wine, saki, tequila, and whisky.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Cooking agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description: This allows your colonists to build a coffee machine, brewery and still, so they can transform hops, berries, rice. agave, and corn, into tasty, tasty beer, wine, saki, tequila, and whisky.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bulk Meal Preparation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build a professional cook stove and prepare large batches of meals at one time.
